mapper.select: select cart_id, m.userid, name , p.product_id, product_name, amount, price , price*amount money from member m, cart c, product p where m.userid=c.userid and p.product_id=c.product_id and m.userid=#{userid}
select nvl(sum(price * amount),0) money from product p, cart c where c.product_id=p.product_id and userid=#{userid}
select product_name,sum(price*amount) money from cart c, product p where c.product_id=p.product_id group by product_name order by product_name
